product_name: Terry Touring Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: This refined Terry Touring Bike Jersey for women lets you stand out in a crowd with its colorful details and reflective accents. Soft polyester fabric features A.M.Y.(R) antimicrobial yarns and Mynx(TM) protection from the sun's UV rays. UPF 30 rating provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Antimicrobial treatment helps keep odors at bay. 3 back pockets hold your snacks and small essentials; the center pocket zips for security. Strategically placed mesh inserts offer cooling airflow. Generous 12 in. front zipper lets you control ventilation. Reflective front seam and shoulder piping increases visibility. The Terry Touring Bike Jersey for women features a loose, relaxed fit with an elastic-free hemline. Closeout.
short_description: This refined Terry Touring Bike Jersey for women lets you stand out in a crowd with its colorful details and reflective accents.
